    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Double3
    This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
    Geometry
    Abstract class Geometry is the basic class representing a geometry in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Main
    Test program for the 1st stage
    Plane
     
    Point
    Class Point is the basic class representing a point of Euclidean geometry in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    RadialGeometry
    Abstract class RadialGeometry is the basic class representing a radial geometry in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Ray
    Class Ray is the basic class representing a ray in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Util
    Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
    Vector
    Class Vector is the basic class representing a vector in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
